My simple ensemble use csv file from these following notebooks:

 1. [mVAN : COVID mRNA Vaccine Analysis Notebook [.268]](https://www.kaggle.com/mukesh2630/mvan-covid-mrna-vaccine-analysis-notebook-268)
 2. [GRU & LSTM mix with custom loss](https://www.kaggle.com/gandagorn/gru-lstm-mix-with-custom-loss)
 3. [GRU & LSTM mix with custom loss - tunning](https://www.kaggle.com/vbmokin/gru-lstm-mix-with-custom-loss-tunning)
